metadata.title: CVE-2023-45235 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: EDK2's Network Package is susceptible to a buffer overflow vulnerabilitywhenhandling Server ID option from a DHCPv6 proxy Advertise message. This vulnerability can be exploited by an attacker to gain unauthorizedaccess and potentially lead to a loss of Confidentiality, Integrity and/orAvailability.

criterions.comment: edk2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
